title: Cavaliers anticipate Kevin Love will return on upcoming road trip
text:
Cavaliers anticipate Kevin Love will return on upcoming road trip The Cleveland Cavaliers, who are 7-6 since All-Star forward Kevin Love went down, start their road trip on Saturday against the Los Angeles Clippers. CLEVELAND (AP) â€” Cleveland Cavaliers general manager David Griffin anticipates forward Kevin Love will return during the team's trip that begins Saturday. 
Love had surgery on his left knee Feb. 14 . The defending NBA champions are 7-6 since he was injured and have been plagued by defensive and rebounding issues without the four-time All-Star. 
Love is having his best season since joining the Cavaliers in 2014, averaging 20 points and 11.1 rebounds. Cleveland was outrebounded 52-38 in Sunday's loss to Houston. A post shared by @kevinlove on Mar 14, 2017 at 12:47pm PDT 
Griffin said Love participated in 3-on-3 drills Tuesday and the team will monitor how he responds before deciding on the next step. The nine-year veteran posted a photo of his uniform hanging in his locker before the Cavaliers' game against the Detroit Pistons. 
Cleveland, which had lost four of five, begins a four-game trip Saturday against the Los Angeles Clippers. The Cavaliers lead Boston by two games for the top spot in the Eastern Conference. Facebook
